page.title: 20A BOY'S DAY
page.content: I wake up in the morning.I have my breakfast with my brothers.Then I have my wash and get dressed and go out on my bike and go down to the shops to buy some sweets.Then I go down the park. About 10 oclock I go home and watch television until lunch.After lunch I go to my nan's house for an hour.Then I go and call for Paul.At Paul's house we play on the computer.Then we go out on our bikes to the shops.Then I go home for tea and learn my spellings for school.Then I have my wash and watch television.Then I go to bed.
